archimate:DataObject.name: DunningCase
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The DunningCase represents a type of cases open for a party. Whenever a party enters the dunning process; a dunning case is linked to his party account debt and it contains all details pertaining to the debt; such as dunning case rules; interactionsâ€¦ The status of a dunning case evolves according to internal or external events (payments made by the party; payment schedule grantedâ€¦).
